comments.author: Dirk Feufel
comments.body: Perhaps someone could also fix "Failed to guess validation query for URL jdbc:hsqldb:hsql ..." for the Hypersonic database.

description:
When using PostgreSQL, the following warning appears in the log file:

> *WARN  [org.apache.jackrabbit.core.util.db.ConnectionFactory] (main)
> Failed to guess validation query for URL
> jdbc:postgresql:...
summary: PostgreSQL: Failed to guess validation query
